reviewText: These two movies were really good, true women was the best . Both these movies sell for a lot more separate, but I got these two together for a good price.If you like anything to do with the south and south west you will like both these movies.True women deals with a time line from before the cival war up to about 40 years after the cival war. Be prepared that the writer does not make the Yankees come out in a very good light.It is a  pretty much accurate history of Texas and I liked that.It shows the need for slavery in that time and the evil of slavery both.It shows both how the native Americans were treated cruel and also how some Native Americans were cruel them selves, I liked that, most movies today hesitate to do that, being of both white and native blood myself  I like for the truth to be in movies.The other movie buffalo girls had a lot of humor in it, a little to much, but over all it was a good movie alI had been wanting True women for along time but it was about $ 18.00 by it's self until now, so I was glad to get these together. sometimes when you get two movies together like this at a discounted price the picture quality is bad, but both these had good picture quality.I would buy both these movies again, especially true women.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I had this tv movie on video, but had been checking from time to time as to when it would be available on DVD.  I remebered, thoughnot as well, True Women.  It's an equally good movie.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Superb acting and superior writing in both movies. I rarely buy DVD's with multiple movies, because  I either have one and don't want the other, or I have them both. in this case I have True Women on VHS, and was looking to replace it on DVD. I had seen Buffalo Girls and liked it but could never find it for the right price. I do collect, so I look for the best sale prices. Thanks to Amazon and their Marketeers; I have quite a collection. When I saw these two for the right price I said HEY NOW.
summary: Wild Wild West Collection: Buffalo Girls / True Women

reviewText: These movies are real entertainment for those who would like to see how women have prevailed hardships through out history. Makes you appreciate the pampered life we all have today.
summary: The Real Way The West Was Won!
